au_160230: sudo apt-get purge vlc
sudo apt-get autoremove
sudo apt-get clean

rm -rf ~/.cache/vlc
rm -rf ~/.config/vlc
rm -rf ~/.local/share/vlc

sudo apt-get update  
sudo apt-get install vlc

au_997691: vlc --playlist-autostart <path/to/playlist.xspf> --run-time=10

export DISPLAY=:0; vlc --playlist-autostart <path/to/playlist.xspf> --run-time=10

export DISPLAY=:0; vlc --playlist-autostart <path/to/playlist.xspf> --run-time=10 vlc://quit
